definition: (used of boats) inclined to heel over easily under sail, a hand tool consisting of a rotating shaft with parallel handle, to bend into the shape of a crank
details:
adjective
- (used of boats) inclined to heel over easily under sail
= synonyms: tender
noun
- a hand tool consisting of a rotating shaft with parallel handle
= synonyms: starter
- an amphetamine derivative (trade name Methedrine) used in the form of a crystalline hydrochloride
= synonyms: chalk, glass, ice, methamphetamine, methamphetamine hydrochloride, meth, deoxyephedrine, chicken feed, shabu, trash
- a whimsically eccentric person
= synonyms: screwball
- a bad-tempered person
= synonyms: grouch, grump, churl, crosspatch
verb
- to bend into the shape of a crank
- to fasten with a crank
- to rotate with a crank
= synonyms: crank up
- to start by cranking
= example: to start by cranking
= synonyms: crank up
- to travel along a zigzag path
= synonyms: zigzag
